com.pathfindersdk.bonus

Class AbilityBonus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pathfindersdk.bonus.Bonus
      • com.pathfindersdk.bonus.AbilityBonus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Bonus>

    public class AbilityBonus
extends Bonus
    This class applies a bonus to an AbilityStat (ex: Bull's Strenght +2 STR).
